generateDescription: Click below to generate the full lesson content using AI. This will create detailed explanations, visualizations, worked examples, and practice exercises.
quizGenerationFailed: Quiz generation failed. You can generate it from the quiz page.
quizGeneratingHint: You can start reading the lesson while the quiz is being prepared.
quizPrompt: Take a quiz to check your grasp of this lesson's material.
vizMalformedWarning: Some visualizations were removed because they contained errors. You may want to regenerate this lesson.
contentSchemaWarning: Some sections were removed or converted because their content format didn't match the expected schema. You may want to regenerate this lesson.

regenerateVizModal.title: Regenerate Visualization
regenerateVizModal.description: Describe what's wrong and optionally attach a screenshot to help the AI generate a better version.
regenerateVizModal.feedbackPlaceholder: e.g. labels overlap, y-axis is unreadable, curve is flat
